trans-unit.source: Specifies a set of standard access rights that correspond to operations common to most types of securable objects.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um conjunto padrão de direitos de acesso que correspondem às operações comuns a maioria dos tipos de objetos com capacidade de segurança.

trans-unit.source: The StandardAccessRights class provides access rights for common operations, such as deleting, reading, and writing.
trans-unit.target: A classe de StandardAccessRights fornece direitos de acesso para operações comuns, tais como eliminar, ler e escrever.

trans-unit.source: The precise meaning of each member is specific to the object type to which it is applied.
trans-unit.target: O significado exatos de cada membro é específico para o tipo de objeto ao qual está aplicado.

trans-unit.source: StandardAccessRights is one of two enumerations to which the <xref:System.Messaging.GenericAccessRights> enumeration maps extensive read, write, or execute abilities.
trans-unit.target: StandardAccessRights é uma das duas enumerações ao qual o <xref:System.Messaging.GenericAccessRights>um vasto conjunto de mapas de enumeração de leitura, escrita ou capacidades de executar.</xref:System.Messaging.GenericAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: StandardAccessRights enables you to specify rights common to most objects, for example, deleting the object or reading a security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: StandardAccessRights permite-lhe especificar os direitos comuns para a maior parte dos objetos, por exemplo, ao eliminar o objeto ou ler um descritor de segurança.

trans-unit.source: Both StandardAccessRights and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights> provide a member for deleting a queue.
trans-unit.target: Ambos os StandardAccessRights e <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights>fornecer um membro para eliminar uma fila.</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: The needs of the application define which set of flags you use.
trans-unit.target: As necessidades da aplicação definem que conjunto de sinalizadores que utilizar.

trans-unit.source: Combines <xref uid="langword_csharp_Delete" name="Delete" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadSecurity" name="ReadSecurity" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_WriteSecurity" name="WriteSecurity" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_ModifyOwner" name="ModifyOwner" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synchronize" name="Synchronize" href=""></xref> access.
trans-unit.target: Combines <xref uid="langword_csharp_Delete" name="Delete" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadSecurity" name="ReadSecurity" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_WriteSecurity" name="WriteSecurity" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_ModifyOwner" name="ModifyOwner" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synchronize" name="Synchronize" href=""></xref> access.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The right to delete the object.
trans-unit.target: O direito de eliminar o objeto.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The right to read the information in the object's security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: O direito de ler as informações do descritor de segurança do objeto.

trans-unit.source: On Windows 2000 and Windows NT, the security descriptor contains the security information for a securable object.
trans-unit.target: No Windows 2000 e do Windows NT, o descritor de segurança contém as informações de segurança para um objeto com capacidade de segurança.

trans-unit.source: It identifies the object's owner and primary group.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o objeto proprietário e de grupo principal.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Execute" name="Execute" href=""></xref> is currently defined to equal <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadSecurity" name="ReadSecurity" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Execute" name="Execute" href=""></xref>Atualmente não está definida para ser igual a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadSecurity" name="ReadSecurity" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The right to change the owner in the object's security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: O direito para alterar o proprietário do descritor de segurança do objeto.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: No access.
trans-unit.target: Sem acesso.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The right to read the information in the object's security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: O direito de ler as informações do descritor de segurança do objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Read" name="Read" href=""></xref> is currently defined to equal <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadSecurity" name="ReadSecurity" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Read" name="Read" href=""></xref>Atualmente não está definida para ser igual a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadSecurity" name="ReadSecurity" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The right to read the information in the object's security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: O direito de ler as informações do descritor de segurança do objeto.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Combines <xref uid="langword_csharp_Delete" name="Delete" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadSecurity" name="ReadSecurity" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_WriteSecurity" name="WriteSecurity" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_ModifyOwner" name="ModifyOwner" href=""></xref> access.
trans-unit.target: Combines <xref uid="langword_csharp_Delete" name="Delete" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadSecurity" name="ReadSecurity" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_WriteSecurity" name="WriteSecurity" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_ModifyOwner" name="ModifyOwner" href=""></xref> access.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The right to use the object for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: O direito de utilizar o objeto de sincronização.

trans-unit.source: This enables a thread to wait until the object is in a specific state.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite que um thread para aguardar até que o objeto está num estado específico.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The right to read the information in the object's security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: O direito de ler as informações do descritor de segurança do objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Write" name="Write" href=""></xref> is currently defined to equal <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadSecurity" name="ReadSecurity" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Write" name="Write" href=""></xref>Atualmente não está definida para ser igual a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadSecurity" name="ReadSecurity" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The right to modify the discretionary access control list (DACL) in the security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: O direito de modificar a lista de controlo de acesso discricionário (DACL) no descritor de segurança.

trans-unit.source: The DACL controls access to the object.
trans-unit.target: O DACL controla o acesso ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: Being able to write to the DACL gives the user the ability to set security for the object.
trans-unit.target: A capacidade de escrever o DACL permite ao utilizador para definir a segurança para o objeto.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
